name: Grave and Bones
description:
You are a tomb raider with a thirst for wealth and power… maybe even a little too much… It is said that these catacombs shelter a unique artefact with great powers! Would you be able to confront the guardian of this dark place and find the artefact

Adventurer, you must dig a grave to find the key that will allow you to obtain the precious artifact and leave the catacombs. Beware of the creature that roams in this crypt because its not very friendly.  In these catacombs there are some flooded areas where you will be slowed down try to avoid them as much as possible.

Oh and I almost forgot, if the creature chases you just hide in the walls!


Controller:

Keyboard :

zqsd: move 

return: interact

left shift: sprint 

right shift: change item
